title: Profile View
desc: Define how the articles should behave when displayed on the user's profile area.

fields.label: Total Articles
fields.tooltip: Specify the number of articles to appear on the profile view.
fields.name: total

fields.label: Article Title Length
fields.tooltip: Specify the number of characters for the title of each article
fields.name: title_length

fields.label: Article Content Length
fields.tooltip: Specify the number of characters for the content of each article. Set this to 0 if you would like to disable truncation
fields.name: content_length
